title: Philadelphia Union and Subaru Reveal Sculpture to celebrate recycling milestone - Philadelphia Union
summary: Subaru of America, Inc. and the Philadelphia Union have unveiled a sculpture at Subaru Park in Chester, PA to commemorate the stadium's achievement of becoming the first zero landfill stadium in Major League Soccer.  Since 2021, Subaru and the Union have diverted over a million pounds of waste from landfills. Subaru has been actively sharing its knowledge and experience with other businesses and organizations to help them achieve zero waste status.

title: SK Chemicals to supply Estée Lauder with eco-friendly packaging materials - Premium beauty
summary: The Estée Lauder Companies is partnering with SK Chemicals, a specialist in advanced recycling, to incorporate recycled and recyclable materials in their packaging. SK Chemicals will supply the cosmetics company with recycled resins, and The Estée Lauder Companies will use these materials to develop eco-friendly circular packaging for their brands.

title: Answering the call for more recyclable packaging - Pet Food Processing
summary: The pet food industry is moving towards more sustainable packaging, with companies signing the Pet Sustainability Coalition's Packaging Pledge to increase the use of refillable, compostable and recyclable packaging by 2025. The use of recyclable packaging offers many benefits, including reducing waste, conserving resources and lowering greenhouse gas emissions.  However, challenges remain, including finding recyclable materials that meet performance requirements and educating consumers on proper recycling practices.

title: Circularity comes to wiring accessories in new Nordic launch | ABB - ABB
summary: ABB, a technology leader in electrification and automation, has launched a new line of wiring accessories called SAGA™. This line features light switches and sockets made from bio-circular, recyclable materials and is manufactured primarily in net-zero operations in Finland. The SAGA™ range boasts a simple design, high-quality standards, and is fully integrated with ABB's home and building automation systems.

title: Young people across Leeds urged to get involved with the big recycling hunt, part of Recycle Week 2023 - Leeds City Council News
summary: Leeds City Council and Recycle Now are launching a recycling campaign for primary school children in Leeds. The campaign, known as "Recycle Week," aims to empower children to become active participants in building a sustainable future by focusing on the importance of recycling the right things. The campaign includes activities like making items from recyclable materials, designing posters, and participating in a "Big Recycling Hunt" to find commonly missed items that end up in the rubbish bin.

title: Wilkhahn furniture supports democratic debate in Brussels town hall chamber - Architecture and Design
summary: The new Brucity administrative building in Brussels boasts a glass facade symbolizing transparency and a circular plenary chamber designed to encourage democratic debate. The building prioritizes sustainability with the use of eco-friendly materials and practices, and it incorporates flexible furniture for various uses, including Wilkhahn's Versa tables and Intra conference chairs.
